I've tried using both 1.4.0 and heritrix-1.5.0-200507120157 and
receive these errors 
while processing a ARC.  Above and beyond this error, is there any
switches available to 
keep extractor running in case of an Exception vs. dying altogether? 
This particular 
exception is occuring at the very beginning of a 100MB ARC, so
obviously lots of possibly 
good data being skipped because of a bad entry.
